title: Oriental meatball broth
ingredients: ['225 g (8 oz) red chard leaves', '1.4 litres (2½ pints) chicken stock, preferably home-made', '2.5 cm (1 in) piece fresh root ginger, peeled and cut into thin strips', '3 tbsp dry sherry', '2 tbsp light soy sauce, or to taste', '200 g (7 oz) baby corn, each sliced diagonally into 2–3 pieces', '115 g (4 oz) shiitake mushrooms, thinly sliced', '200 g (7 oz) mange-tout, each cut diagonally into 2–3 pieces', '1 can sliced bamboo shoots, about 220 g, drained', '6 spring onions, thinly sliced diagonally', 'Rice and pork meatballs', '170 g (6 oz) long-grain rice', '340 g (12 oz) lean minced pork', '2.5 cm (1 in) piece fresh root ginger, peeled and grated', '6 spring onions, chopped', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '½ tsp toasted sesame oil', '½ tsp five-spice powder', 'pinch of chilli powder', '225 g (8 oz) pak choy']
